trans-unit.source: Provides methods that enable you to specify the position of a control, group, or tab in a Ribbon customization.
trans-unit.target: 提供使你可以指定功能区自定义中的控件、组或选项卡的位置的方法。

trans-unit.source: The ID of the built-in control, group, or tab that the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonPosition" /> object uses to define a relative location for another control, group, or tab.
trans-unit.target: 内置控件、组或选项卡的 ID，<see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonPosition" /> 对象将其用于定义另一控件、组或选项卡的相对位置。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonPosition" /> object that represents the location of a control, group, or tab after the specified built-in control, group, or tab.
trans-unit.target: 返回 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonPosition" /> 对象，该对象表示指定内置控件、组或选项卡后面的控件、组或选项卡的位置。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonPosition" /> object that represents the location of a control, group, or tab after the specified built-in control, group, or tab.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonPosition" /> 对象，该对象表示指定内置控件、组或选项卡后面的控件、组或选项卡的位置。

trans-unit.source: Use this method or the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonPositionStatics.BeforeOfficeId%2A> method to create <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonPosition> object.
trans-unit.target: 使用此方法或<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonPositionStatics.BeforeOfficeId%2A>方法来创建<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonPosition>对象。

trans-unit.source: The ID is a name that uniquely identifies a control, group, or tab that is built into a Microsoft Office application.
trans-unit.target: 该 ID 是唯一标识控件、 组或内置于 Microsoft Office 应用程序的选项卡的名称。

trans-unit.source: For a list of IDs, see the Microsoft Download Center Web page [Office 2010 Help Files: Office Fluent User Interface Control Identifiers](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=181052).
trans-unit.target: Id 的列表，请参阅 Microsoft 下载中心网页[Office 2010 帮助文件： Office Fluent 用户界面控件标识符](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=181052)。

trans-unit.source: The ID of the built-in control, group, or tab that the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonPosition" /> uses to define a relative location for another control, group, or tab.
trans-unit.target: 内置控件、组或选项卡的 ID，<see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonPosition" /> 将其用于定义另一控件、组或选项卡的相对位置。

trans-unit.source: Returns a new <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonPosition" /> object that represents the location of a control, group, or tab before a built-in control, group, or tab.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个新的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonPosition" /> 对象，该对象表示指定内置控件、组或选项卡前面的控件、组或选项卡的位置。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonPosition" /> object that represents the location of a control, group, or tab before the specified built-in control, group, or tab.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonPosition" /> 对象，该对象表示指定内置控件、组或选项卡前面的控件、组或选项卡的位置。

trans-unit.source: Use this method or the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonPositionStatics.AfterOfficeId%2A> method to create an <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonPosition> object.
trans-unit.target: 使用此方法或<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonPositionStatics.AfterOfficeId%2A>方法来创建<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonPosition>对象。

trans-unit.source: The ID is a name that uniquely identifies a control, group, or tab that is built into a Microsoft Office application.
trans-unit.target: 该 ID 是唯一标识控件、 组或内置于 Microsoft Office 应用程序的选项卡的名称。

trans-unit.source: For a list of IDs, see the Microsoft Download Center Web page [Office 2010 Help Files: Office Fluent User Interface Control Identifiers](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=181052).
trans-unit.target: Id 的列表，请参阅 Microsoft 下载中心网页[Office 2010 帮助文件： Office Fluent 用户界面控件标识符](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=181052)。
